room_title: Escape room "Jungle Quest VR" by Escapology Covington in Covington
room_description:
It turns out our world is not the only one.

During a walk in the park, you found a portal that leads to the mysterious world. An amazing sanctuary populated by animals appears in front of you. But how do you get back?

To find the way home, you have to solve a series of puzzles and explore the mysterious world of flying islands. IMPORTANT NOTE: To book this game, select "Virtual Reality Mission" from our booking page. This is a Virtual Reality escape game, unlike our other 4 live escape games. This particular game must be played in groups of 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 players. Our Virtual Reality arena can accommodate up to 6 players. The minimum height requirement to play is 4 feet tall and the minimum age requirement is 10 years of age. Mission Time Approximately: 15 minutes of training and 45 minutes of game time for a total Virtual Reality experience of 1 hour. Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your reservation time for pre-mission requirements.
